title: Sprint, T-Mobile agree to $26 billion merger
text:
Sprint, T-Mobile agree to $26 billion merger 3:05am EDT - 01:22
T-Mobile and Sprint said on Sunday they had agreed to a $26 billion all-stock deal as they aim to take on top competitors Verizon Wireless and AT&T. Lisa Bernhard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
T-Mobile and Sprint said on Sunday they had agreed to a $26 billion all-stock deal as they aim to take on top competitors Verizon Wireless and AT&T. Lisa Bernhard reports.
